metadata.title: CVE-2020-6553 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in offline mode in Google Chrome on iOS prior to84.0.4147.125 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
